DOC.brief_summary: The investigator prospectively determine impact median door-to-balloon time protocol mandating ( 1 ) emergency department physician activation catheterization lab ( 2 ) immediate transfer patient immediately available catheterization lab in-house transfer team consist emergency department nurse , critical care unit nurse , chest pain unit nurse .
DOC.criteria: Primary Study STelevation myocardial infarction patient undergo percutaneous intervention within 24 hour ED arrival Patients inpatients A registry patient undergo emergency cardiac catheterization irrespective etiology maintain .
